Question & Options:
In the 2018 movie 'Jalebi', which of the following statements are true regarding the relationship between Disha 'Pulti' Mathur and Dev Mathur?
Options:
A. A) Disha is Dev's biological daughter.
B. B) Dev is Disha's adoptive father.
C. C) Disha and Dev share a close father-daughter bond.
D. D) Disha was raised by Dev after her biological parents were absent.
